TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit DesignSurface extends System.Object implements class System.IDisposable, class System.IServiceProvider
Public Class DesignSurface Implements IDisposable, IServiceProvider
public ref class DesignSurface : IDisposable, IServiceProvider
type DesignSurface = class interface IDisposable interface IServiceProvider

summary.span: 为设计组件提供一个用户界面。

span.span: Presents a user interface for designing components.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类实现用户视为设计器的内容。The class implements what the user perceives as a designer. 是用户用于更改设计时功能的用户界面。 is the user interface the user manipulates to change design-time features. 提供完全独立的设计图面。 provides a completely self-contained design surface. 类可用作独立设计器，也可以与 类结合使用，以便为承载多个 对象的应用程序提供公共实现。The class may be used as a stand-alone designer, or it may be coupled with the class to provide a common implementation for an application that hosts multiple objects. 类可单独使用，也可从其派生新类并增加行为。The class can be used by itself, or the user can derive a new class from it and augment the behavior. 类自动提供若干设计时服务。The class provides several design-time services automatically. 类在其构造函数中添加了它的所有服务。The class adds all of its services in its constructor. 其中的大多数服务可以通过在 "受保护 " 属性中替换来替代。Most of these services can be overridden by replacing them in the protected property. 若要替换服务，请重写构造函数、调用基，并通过 protected 属性进行任何更改。To replace a service, override the constructor, call base, and make any changes through the protected property. 当处理设计图面时，将释放添加到服务容器并实现 的所有服务。All services that are added to the service container and that implement are disposed when the design surface is disposed. 下表显示了 类提供的一组默认可替换服务。The default set of replaceable services that the class provides is shown in the following table. |服务Service|说明Description| |-------------|-----------------| ||启用不属于容器组件集合的对象，以提供其自己的扩展程序提供程序。Enables objects that are not part of the container's components collection to provide their own extender providers.| ||由 用来获取扩展程序提供程序的列表。Used by to get a list of extender providers. 对于此服务，扩展程序提供程序可以在容器的外部。With this service, extender providers can live outside of the container.| ||提供设计器元数据挂钩。Provides designer metadata hooks. 这是用于元数据筛选的主接口。This is the primary interface for metadata filtering.| ||提供在设计器中选择组件的方法。Provides a way to select components in the designer.| ||提供了一种方法来获取对象的名称，即使这些对象未放置。Provides a way to get a name for objects, even when those objects are not sited.| ||以服务的形式提供设计图面本身。Offers the design surface itself as a service.| ||提供用于获取和设置设计器选项值的基类。Provides a base class for getting and setting option values for a designer.| 下表显示了默认情况下提供的不可替换服务。The following table shows the non-replaceable services provided by default. |服务Service|说明Description| |-------------|-----------------| ||对组件进行更改时引发事件。Raises events as changes are made to components.| ||控制对类型、服务和事务的访问。Controls access to types, services, and transactions. 设计器的主接口。Master interface for designers.| ||拥有正在设计的一组组件。Owns the set of components that are being designed. 每个设计器都有一个拥有组件的 。Each designer has an that owns the components.| ||派生自 ，并提供一种在设计器中添加和移除服务的方法。Derives from and provides a way to add and remove services from the designer.| 除了这些服务以外， 类还提供了可通过组件的站点获得的单个服务。In addition to these services, the class also provides a single service that is available through a component's site. 对于每个组件，此服务都是唯一的。This service is unique for each component. 下表显示了无法替换的服务。The following table shows the services that cannot be replaced. |服务Service|说明Description| |-------------|-----------------| ||键/值对的泛型字典，可用于存储有关组件的任意数据。A generic dictionary of key/value pairs that can be used to store arbitrary data about a component.| ||允许组件将其他子组件添加到设计器中的容器。A container that enables a component to add additional child components to the designer. 这些组件将是设计图面的一部分，但不会参与序列化。These components will be part of the design surface, but will not participate in serialization. 当您希望设计一个能够在设计器中公开其本身的区域，但不希望该区域参与序列化的控件时，这非常有用。This is useful when you want to design a control that is capable of exposing a region of itself in a designer, but you do not want the region to participate in serialization.| 除了 之外，站点还实现以下接口。In addition to , the site also implements the following interfaces. > [!CAUTION] > 检查是否存在这些接口，而不是使用任意强制转换，因为其他站点实现可能不会实现它们。Check for the existence of these interfaces, rather than use indiscriminate casting, because other site implementations may not implement them. |服务Service|说明Description| |-------------|-----------------| ||提供一种方法来访问站点特定的服务的容器。Provides a way to get to the container of site-specific services. 例如， 是特定于站点的服务。For example, is a site-specific service. 通过此服务，你可以添加其他特定于站点的服务。With this service, you can add additional site-specific services.|

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 构造函数时，它将创建一个简单的设计器加载程序，进而创建给定类型的组件，然后结束加载进程。When you use the constructor, it creates a simple designer loader that, in turn, creates a component of the given type and then ends the loading process. 这是创建设计器的一种简单方法，在假定所有状态保存都将从外部完成。This is a straightforward way to create a designer, under the assumption that all saving of state will be done externally. 在内部，这将调用 并传递根组件类型。Internally, this calls and passes the root component type. > [!NOTE] > 重载不受 影响。The overload is not affected by . 在加载设计图面之前， 必须在服务容器中。The must be in the service container before the design surface loads. 如果需要对 的访问权限，请调用空构造函数，将 添加到 ，并使用 `rootComponentType`调用 。If you need access to , call the empty constructor, add the to the and call with `rootComponentType`.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 构造函数将创建一个简单的设计器加载程序，用于创建给定类型的组件，然后结束加载进程。Using the constructor creates a simple designer loader that creates a component of the given type and then ends the loading process. 这是创建设计器的一种简单方法，在假定所有状态保存都将从外部完成。This is a straightforward way to create a designer, under the assumption that all saving of state will be done externally. 在内部，这将调用 并传递根组件类型。Internally, this calls and passes the root component type.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void BeginLoad(class System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.DesignerLoader loader) cil managed

param.name: loader
param.span: 用于加载设计器的设计器加载程序。

span.span: The designer loader to use for loading the designer.

summary.span: 使用给定的设计器加载程序开始加载过程。

span.span: Begins the loading process with the given designer loader.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 设计器加载可以是异步的，因此，在此调用返回后加载可能会继续进行。Designer loading can be asynchronous, so the loading may continue to progress after this call has returned. 将事件处理程序附加到 事件，以在设计图面完成加载时收到通知。Attach an event handler to the event to be notified when the design surface has completed loading. 调用 后，可以立即获取设计器的视图，因为设计器加载程序在异步加载时必须至少提供根组件。After is called, you can immediately obtain the view for the designer, because designer loaders must provide at least the root component when loading asynchronously.

exception.span: 为 。

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void BeginLoad(class System.Type rootComponentType) cil managed

param.name: rootComponentType
param.span: 要在设计模式中创建的组件的类型。

span.span: The type of component to create in design mode.

summary.span: 开始加载过程。

span.span: Begins the loading process.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 指定 `rootComponentType` 时，将使用只创建 `rootComponentType` 实例的默认设计器加载程序。When `rootComponentType` is specified, a default designer loader that simply creates an instance of `rootComponentType` will be used. 设计器加载可以是异步的，因此，在此调用返回后加载可能会继续进行。Designer loading can be asynchronous, so the loading may continue to progress after this call has returned. 将事件处理程序附加到 事件，以在设计图面完成加载时收到通知。Attach an event handler to the event to be notified when the design surface has completed loading. 调用 后，可以立即获取设计器的视图，因为设计器加载程序在异步加载时必须至少提供根组件。After is called, you can immediately obtain the view for the designer, because designer loaders must provide at least the root component when loading asynchronously. > [!NOTE] > 方法创建组件类型的实例，并为此实例初始化设计器。The method creates an instance of the component type and initializes a designer for this instance. 此方法返回前引发 事件。The event is raised before this method returns.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性保存当前处于设计模式下的所有对象。The property holds all objects that are currently in design mode. 将组件添加到 时，将加载其设计器（如果有）。When components are added to , their designer, if any, is loaded. 该组件被放置在一个提供对设计图面的完全访问权限的站点上。The component is sited with a site that provides full access to the design surface.

summary.span: 在将组件添加到容器时创建设计器。

span.span: Creates a designer when a component is added to the container.

returns.span: 所请求的设计器的实例，如果找不到匹配的设计器，则为 。

span.span: An instance of the requested designer, or if no matching designer could be found.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 将组件添加到容器中时，设计图面的 会调用 方法。The method is called by the design surface's when a component is added to the container. 此方法将创建一个设计器，但不会对其进行初始化。This method creates a designer, but does not initialize it. 当它返回时，由容器初始化设计器。When it returns, the designer is initialized by the container. 可以创建两种不同类型的设计器：根设计器和正常设计器。 can create two different types of designers: root designers and normal designers. 根设计器是设计图面中根组件的设计器，根据定义，它是添加到容器中的第一个组件。A root designer is a designer for the root component in the design surface, which by definition is the first component added to the container. 根设计器不同于普通设计器，因为它们负责向最终用户显示的用户界面。Root designers differ from normal designers because they are responsible for the user interface presented to the end user. 根设计器通常与设计图面上的其他设计器协调器来提供此接口。Root designers typically coordinate with the rest of the designers on a design surface to provide this interface. 此方法的默认实现将委托给 ，并传入 作为根设计器的设计器类型，或为普通设计器提供 。The default implementation of this method delegates to , passing in as the designer type for root designers, or for normal designers. 可以重写此方法来请求特定类型的设计器。You can override this method to request a specific type of designer.

The nested container.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果将组件添加到嵌套容器，则将创建其设计器，并使其符合设计图面中可用的所有服务。Adding a component to a nested container creates its designer and makes it eligible for all services available from the design surface. 添加到嵌套容器的组件不参与序列化。Components added to nested containers do not participate in serialization.

The nested container.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果将组件添加到嵌套容器，则将创建其设计器，并使其符合设计图面中可用的所有服务。Adding a component to a nested container creates its designer and makes it eligible for all services available from the design surface. 添加到嵌套容器的组件不参与序列化。Components added to nested containers do not participate in serialization. 可以通过将值传递到 `containerName`为 方法提供其他名称。You can provide an additional name for the method by passing a value into `containerName`.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void Dispose() cil managed
abstract member Dispose : unit -> unit override this.Dispose : unit -> unit

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 释放 使用的资源。

span.span: Releases the resources used by the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks Public 方法遵循标准 模式。The public method follows the standard pattern. 调用此方法会销毁设计图面。Calling this method destroys the design surface. 此方法的受保护版本是 `virtual` 的，并遵循正常的 模式。The protected version of this method is `virtual` and follows the normal pattern. > [!NOTE] > 由于 没有任何要清理的本机代码，因此它没有调用 的终结器。Because does not have any native code to clean up, it does not have a finalizer that calls . 如果需要调用 ，则必须自行添加终结器。If you need to call , you must add a finalizer yourself. 在完成使用 后，应调用 。Call when you are finished using the . 方法使 处于不可用状态。The method leaves the in an unusable state. 调用 后，必须释放对 的所有引用，以便垃圾回收器可以回收 占用的内存。After calling , you must release all references to the so the garbage collector can reclaim the memory that the was occupying. 有关详细信息，请参阅[清理非托管资源](/dotnet/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged)和[实现 Dispose 方法](/dotnet/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose)。For more information, see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](/dotnet/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged) and [Implementing a Dispose Method](/dotnet/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose). > [!NOTE] > 每次释放对 的最后一个引用前，均应调用 。Always call before you release your last reference to the . 否则，在垃圾回收器调用 对象的 `Finalize` 方法之前，该对象正在使用的资源不会被释放。Otherwise, the resources it is using will not be freed until the garbage collector calls the object's `Finalize` method.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig newslot virtual instance void Dispose(bool disposing) cil managed
Protected Overridable Sub Dispose (disposing As Boolean)
abstract member Dispose : bool -> unit override this.Dispose : bool -> unit

param.name: disposing
param.span: 如果为 ，则托管及非托管资源都释放；如果为 ，则仅释放非托管资源。

span.span: to release both managed and unmanaged resources; to release only unmanaged resources.

summary.span: 释放 使用的资源。

span.span: Releases the resources used by the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks Public 方法遵循标准 模式。The public method follows the standard pattern. 调用此方法会销毁设计图面。Calling this method destroys the design surface. 此方法的受保护版本是 `virtual` 的，并遵循正常的 模式。The protected version of this method is `virtual` and follows the normal pattern. > [!NOTE] > 由于 没有任何要清理的本机代码，因此它没有调用 的终结器。Because does not have any native code to clean up, it does not have a finalizer that calls . 如果需要调用 ，则必须自行添加终结器。If you need to call , you must add a finalizer yourself. 此方法由 public `Dispose()` 方法和 方法调用。This method is called by the public `Dispose()` method and the method. `Dispose()` 调用受保护的 `Dispose(Boolean)` 方法，并将 `disposing` 参数设置为 `true`。`Dispose()` invokes the protected `Dispose(Boolean)` method with the `disposing` parameter set to `true`. 调用 `disposing` 设置为 `false`的 `Dispose`。 invokes `Dispose` with `disposing` set to `false`. 如果 `disposing` 参数为 true，则此方法将释放此 引用的任何托管对象所持有的所有资源。When the `disposing` parameter is true, this method releases all resources held by any managed objects that this references. 此方法将调用每个被引用对象的 `Dispose()` 方法。This method invokes the `Dispose()` method of each referenced object.

para.span: 可以由其他对象多次调用。

span.span: can be called multiple times by other objects.

para.span: 重写时，请注意不要引用先前在调用 之前已释放的对象。

span.span: When overriding be careful not to reference objects that have been previously disposed of in an earlier call to .

para.span: 有关如何实现 的详细信息，请参阅[实现 Dispose 方法](/dotnet/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose)。

span.span: For more information about how to implement , see [Implementing a Dispose Method](/dotnet/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose).

para.span: 有关 和 的详细信息，请参阅[清理非托管资源](/dotnet/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged)和[重写 Finalize 方法](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/ddae83kx(v=vs.100))。

span.span: For more information about and , see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](/dotnet/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged) and [Overriding the Finalize Method](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/ddae83kx(v=vs.100)).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 仅当调用 上的公共 方法时，才会释放图面。The surface is only disposed when the public method on is called.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void Flush() cil managed

summary.span: 序列化对设计图面的更改。

span.span: Serializes changes to the design surface.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以调用 方法，将设计图面上所做的更改推送到序列化程序。The method can be called to push changes made to the design surface down to the serializer. 这可确保设计图面及其序列化状态已同步。This ensures that the design surface and its serialized state are synchronized. 此方法的实际实现将转发到与设计图面关联的设计器加载程序。The actual implementation of this method is forwarded to the designer loader associated with design surface. 设计器加载程序可以选择在调用 之前延迟更改，也可以选择将序列化的数据与所有用户更改保持最新。The designer loader may choose to defer changes until is called, or it may choose to keep the serialized data up to date with all user changes. 方法可确保无论设计器加载程序选择使用哪种模型，序列化状态都与实际设计图面同步。The method ensures that regardless of the model the designer loader chooses to use, the serialized state is synchronized with the actual design surface.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event Flushed As EventHandler

summary.span: 调用 的 方法时发生。

span.span: Occurs when a call is made to the method of .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 首先刷新设计器加载程序，然后引发 事件。The designer loader is flushed first, and then the event is raised.

span.span: An object that implements, or is a derived class of, , or if the service does not exist in the service container.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法将检索设计图面的服务容器中的服务。The method retrieves a service in the design surface's service container. 此外，此操作还会转发到在构造时提供给设计图面的任何服务提供程序。In addition, this will forward to any service provider that was given to the design surface at construction time.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event Loaded As LoadedEventHandler

summary.span: 在设计器加载完成时发生。

span.span: Occurs when the designer load has completed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果成功加载，则会引发 事件，并引发失败。The event is raised for successful loads as well as unsuccessful ones. 如果此事件处理程序中的代码引发异常，则将卸载设计器。If code in this event handler throws an exception, the designer is unloaded. 对象可用于确定加载是否成功，还可以提供在加载过程中发生的错误的列表。The object can be used to determine if loading succeeded, and it can also provide a list of errors that occurred during the load. > [!NOTE] > 如果序列化系统可以容忍错误，则也可能会发生成功的加载错误。Errors can occur for successful loads as well, provided that the serialization system can tolerate errors.

MemberSignature.Value: Protected ReadOnly Property ServiceContainer As ServiceContainer

summary.span: 获取服务容器。

span.span: Gets the service container.

value.span: 为设计图面中包含的设计器提供所有服务的服务容器。

span.span: The service container that provides all services to designers contained within the design surface.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在构造时， 向此服务容器添加默认服务。At construction time, adds default services into this service container. 你可以保留默认服务的当前状态，也可以删除它们并将其替换为你自己的服务。You can leave the default services in their present state, or you can remove them and replace them with your own. 默认服务都是按需创建的，因此在构造时添加它们的性能没有损失。The default services are all demand-created, so there is no loss in performance for adding them at construction time.

exception.span: 附加到 的 已被释放。

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event Unloaded As EventHandler

summary.span: 在设计器完成卸载时发生。

span.span: Occurs when a designer has finished unloading.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event Unloading As EventHandler

summary.span: 在设计器将要卸载时发生。

span.span: Occurs when a designer is about to unload.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当设计器卸载时，将销毁该设计器的整个状态，包括设计器的视图。When a designer unloads, the entire state for that designer is destroyed, including the designer's view. 此时，视图应为 unparented。The view should be unparented at this time.
